name: Pyq AI
headline: Make pushing paper your company's superpower
description:
We build automations that can pull information from documents, fill out forms and software, and integrate with your existing systems.

For example, insurance brokerages use us to pull information from policies, fill out forms, update accounting software and generate proposals.
tags: industry:documents; industry:generative-ai; industry:machine-learning; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Aman Raghuvanshi, Founder
founders.description: Prior to co-founding Pyq, I worked at Sightly where I was the Director of Product. Studied Computer Science at Claremont McKenna College (through Harvey Mudd) and graduated in 2018. I enjoy watching F1, reading (mostly historical non-fiction that reads like fiction) and playing squash. I hold two A.I. patents.

founders.name: Emily Dorsey, Founder
founders.description: I previously worked on the HoloLens at Microsoft.  I studied Computer Science and French at Harvey Mudd College, and graduated in 2018.  I love reality TV, knitting, and baking.

# Use AI to make pushing paper your company's superpower
Automations that can pull information from documents, fill out forms and software, and integrate with your existing systems
[Book a demo](https://www.pyqai.com/<https:/calendly.com/aman-pyq/pyq-intro-call>)[Use Cases](https://www.pyqai.com/</products>)
## Backed by Investors:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a8ef5fd4272d7f7a3981a5_logo-ycombinator.png)![Singularity Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64b6f88bc767e83e642e5509_Singularity_Logo_White.png)![Willowtree Investments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64b9a0a16c85a110157883b7_output-onlinepngtools-2.png)
readymade automations
## Integrate In 24-48 Hours
Use these readymade automations as inspiration, or integrate with them immediately. If you have suggestions for what we can add next or want to get access to the tooling to build your own, [get in touch!](https://www.pyqai.com/<https:/calendly.com/aman-pyq/30min>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/65ba99b9d9d50de7ae55c315_out-0-3.png)for insurance brokersPolicy ComparisonExtract and compare details from quotes and policies in moments, and export them to your AMS.](https://www.pyqai.com/</products/policy-comparison>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/65bbf3d994ff65ded00aa12b_out-0-4.png)for insurance brokersCommission ExtractorExtract commission amounts and policy details from commission statements, and export them to your AMS.](https://www.pyqai.com/</products/commission-extractor>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/6627d52d0c119a902335eade_out-0-6.png)for insurance brokersComparative RaterPull and compare quotes from carrier portals, export to any AMS and construct a proposal](https://www.pyqai.com/</products/comparative-rater>)
PYQ
## Enterprise Workflow Automations That Work
Fetching documents from websites, analyzing and comparing them, and exporting that data to other systems is cumbersome.We've built robust LLM-powered RPA, state-of-the-art document understanding, industry-specific large language models and infrastructure to make this a breeze.
![Targeted & Task-Specific](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a62fce1c888e32ab4a6c6f_icon-solutions-taskSpecific.svg)
### Robust and (actually) Smart
Our RPA, document ingestion and processing systems can adapt to changes in your documents and underlying systems automatically, which means things don't break when those systems and documents inevitably change.
![Interpretable Models](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a6315c39b7be36f19345f7_icon-solutions-Interpretable.svg)
### Handles Complexity Seamlessly
Documents are never standardized, workflows always have exceptions and special cases, downstream systems are never easy to integrate with. We build state of the art AI to deal with all of these situations every day.
![Trained on Your Data](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a6315d0b18f841dbb8194a_icon-solutions-dataTrained.svg)
### Integrates with Your Systems
Plug into your ERP, AMS, CRM and anything else you already use. It's meant to integrate into your business seamlessly. Doesn't have to be another thing to log into, unless you want that.
![Privacy Conscious](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a6315d1c888e32ab4c3966_icon-solutions-Privacy.svg)
### Privacy Conscious
We're SOC2 Type II & HIPAA compliant, and offer on-prem deployments for the entire stack on request.
Readymade Solutions
## Quickly Onboard For Specific Use-Cases
Integrate quickly with our out-of-the-box automations
[Readymade Solutions](https://www.pyqai.com/</products>)
![Tackle Specific Hurdles](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a723ec8de39b29ec62e70a_RmSolutions-cardimage-1.png)
### Tackle specific hurdles
These solutions are designed to solve common problems for specific industries.
[Readymade Solutions](https://www.pyqai.com/</products>)
### Minimal Development Needed
Using our readymade solutions, you can start using AI with little to no development effort.
[Readymade Solutions](https://www.pyqai.com/</products>)
![Accelerate Innovation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a7233b9e2444ee67ac45b5_RmSolutions-cardimage-2.png)
Enterprise Solutions
## Work With Us to Build Custom Automations
Leverage our comprehensive platform and expertise to create custom automations that are built specifically for your needs.
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a729d10cea4989668df02e_icon-check.svg)
### Tailor-Made Solutions
Our team of experts works with you to build automations that are tailored to your business
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a729d10cea4989668df02e_icon-check.svg)
### Hands-On Support
SLAs, ongoing production support and deployment support packages available.
![Enterprise Solutions Illustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a729d2eb1408cd24625afb_Enterprise-main-image.png)
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a729d10cea4989668df02e_icon-check.svg)
### Deploy Anywhere
Run the entire system in our cloud, yours or anywhere else, with our setup expertise included.
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a5aefc0eaa7440ca8f6fd3/64a729d10cea4989668df02e_icon-check.svg)
### Advanced Analytics
Unlock key insights with our robust analytics and reporting features.
[Book an Enterprise Call](https://www.pyqai.com/<https:/calendly.com/aman-pyq/30min>)
## Stop pushing paper manually 
Automate your organzation's mundane, repetitive tasks and use that time to grow
[Book a demo](https://www.pyqai.com/<https:/calendly.com/aman-pyq/30min>)[Use Cases](https://www.pyqai.com/</products>)
Need more help? Email us by clicking here

generated_description:
## Pyq AI: Transforming Document Management into a Superpower

### Overview
Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, Pyq AI is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to streamline document handling for businesses. Their slogan, "Make pushing paper your company's superpower," encapsulates their aim to automate the tedious paperwork process that often bogs down productivity.

### What They Do
Pyq AI builds automations that simplify the extraction of information from documents, auto-filling forms, and integrating seamlessly with existing software systems. This approach not only saves time but also minimizes the risk of errors associated with manual data entry.

Their technology is particularly beneficial for insurance brokerages that utilize Pyq AI to:

- Pull crucial details from insurance policies
- Streamline form filling
- Update accounting software
- Generate proposals swiftly

### Key Offerings
Pyq AI’s platform includes several innovative features:

1. **Document Extraction**: Create structured, type-safe JSON from varied documents.
2. **Browser Automation**: Automate repetitive tasks in the browser.
3. **Document Querying**: Interact with documents using natural language queries.

Their product suite also showcases industry-specific solutions, primarily targeting the insurance sector with additional plans for banking and healthcare in the pipeline. 

### The Team
With a compact team of just two employees, Pyq AI's nimbleness allows for rapid iteration and deployment. They enjoy support from Michael Seibel, a prominent group partner at Y Combinator, which adds credibility to their innovative approach.

### Market Position and Technology
Labeled under tags such as 'documents', 'generative AI', and 'machine learning', Pyq AI uses state-of-the-art technologies to build robust and adaptive automated systems. Their solutions are designed to handle the intricacies of real-world documents, ensuring that businesses can automate tasks without frequent interruptions due to unexpected changes.

### Privacy and Compliance
Recognizing the sensitivity surrounding business data, Pyq AI assures its clients with SOC2 Type II and HIPAA compliance, providing peace of mind that their systems adhere to high standards of privacy and security.

### Future Directions
As they continue to evolve, Pyq AI aims to expand its offerings into banking and healthcare sectors, enhancing their automation capabilities and making a larger impact across various industries.

### Conclusion
In essence, Pyq AI is not just about reducing paperwork; it's about unleashing potential. By automating the mundane and error-prone processes tied to document management, they allow businesses to focus on what truly matters—growth and innovation. If you're interested in seeing what they can do, check out their website for demos and further information: [Pyq AI](https://www.pyqai.com).
